messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE: Harry Potter Club for unschoolers 10-13 yrs. old
messages.msgSnippet: There is a folder on the unschooling message boards where the kids are talking about Harry Potter.  You might want to hook up with them.  It sounds as if there
messages.messageBody:
There is a folder on the unschooling message boards where the kids are
talking about Harry Potter. You might want to hook up with them. It sounds
as if there might be enough kids right here to form their own HP group.
Would the children want to do this by email, message boards or in chats?

LisaKK

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE: Harry Potter Club for unschoolers 10-13 yrs. old
messages.msgSnippet: Hi- My 13yog and 11 and 9yob would be very interested in a Harry Potter story sharing group.  Thanks for sharing the role playing group. Let us know the
messages.messageBody:
Hi-
My 13yog and 11 and 9yob would be very interested in a
Harry Potter story sharing group. Thanks for sharing
the role playing group.
Let us know the details or if we can help start a
group.

Thanks.
Carol B.
